top10_tweets_like:
Galton board now working (in mysterious ways!)

Hoping to release {chipmunkcore} package soon - you'll be able to place your own segments and circular bodies for 2d rigid body physics sim.

#RStats @carroll_jono https://t.co/p5QkPQNOuU

#rstats ggpplot2 mapping:

ggplot() +
  layer_mapbox(spData::cycle_hire_osm) +
  layer_spatial(spData::cycle_hire_osm,
                aes(colour = capacity),
                alpha = 0.75) +
  scale_colour_viridis_b() +
  inset_legend_dark("bottom-right") +
  theme_cropped_map() https://t.co/wNBER53mGF
